name: Yakuman Wii: Ide Yosuke no Kenkou Mahjong
overview: It is a mah-jong game that fights various character characters using "Health Majo" rules that unify rules that differ according to generations and regions, so that everyone can enjoy it with ease. Even one person can play against the character operated by the computer, or you can use the Nintendo Wi - Fi connection to compete with players nationwide or far away acquaintances. "Health general maiden" is a mah-jong who pursued the fun of the original game. It unified rules and manners which differed depending on generation and region, so that anyone could feel free to enjoy mah-jong. "Support" which gives advice as to which tile AI (artificial intelligence) supervised by Ide master tips should be cut off and which tiles of the tiles are "safe" to which player "safe tile prediction "Supporting functions such as" surrogacy "function that computer gets in place instead of yourself when it is necessary to take a hands on errands during the game are recorded.
